full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA BSTOD PA MYUR GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,ZHES DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA BSTOD PA 'PHRIN LAS MYUR GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI DAM PA RNAMS SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHABS BRTUL SPYI BOS LEN @006B PA'I BTZUN GZUGS ^ BUDDHA RA LI HAS RANG GIS RGYUN 'DON GYI CHED DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SBYOR LA BRTZON PA'I NYE DGE TSUL TSE RING RDO RJES BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
